contribution_desc: Study on (ubiquitous) multi-device use. In in-situ interviews, study participants reported on their use of digital and non-digital artifacts and their interactions with them. As an outcome, authors report different types of usage patterns (i.e. parallel device use), using devices for specialized tasks (e.g., reading), and the fragmentation of data across a users
target_users: Individual; 'real' users; Health; Engineering; Creative; Business/Marketing; Information Tech.
